label: FIPS 140-3
description: NIST cryptographic module validation program
compliance_notes: CMVP validation will require PQC algorithm support. FIPS 203/204/205 already published.

label: Common Criteria
description: International security evaluation framework
compliance_notes: New protection profiles for PQC are being developed. Certification timelines vary by scheme.

label: ANSSI
description: French national cybersecurity agency regulation
compliance_notes: French regulation requires hybrid PQC for new systems. Full migration by 2030.

label: CNSA 2.0
description: NSA mandate for national security systems
compliance_notes: NSA mandate for U.S. national security systems. Aggressive timeline.

label: eIDAS 2.0
description: EU Digital Identity and Trust Services regulation
compliance_notes: EU Digital Identity framework. PQC readiness expected for wallet implementations.

label: PCI DSS
description: Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard
compliance_notes: Payment card industry will follow NIST guidance. Monitor for updates.

label: HIPAA
description: US health data privacy and security rule
compliance_notes: Healthcare data has long sensitivity periods — HNDL risk is significant.

label: GSMA NG.116 / FS.40
description: GSMA PQC guidelines for mobile network operators
compliance_notes: Mobile network operator PQC guidance from GSMA. Covers 5G and beyond.

label: ETSI TS 103 744
description: ETSI quantum-safe cryptography for telecommunications
compliance_notes: ETSI specification for quantum-safe algorithms in telecom protocols.

label: DORA (EU Digital Operational Resilience)
description: EU financial sector ICT risk and resilience regulation
compliance_notes: Operational resilience requirements for EU financial entities. Crypto risk in scope.

label: SWIFT CSP
description: SWIFT Customer Security Programme mandatory controls
compliance_notes: Annual security attestation required for SWIFT network participants.

label: ISO 27001
description: International information security management standard
compliance_notes: Widely adopted ISMS standard. No explicit PQC deadline but requires crypto risk management.

label: SOC 2
description: Service Organization Control 2 trust services criteria
compliance_notes: Trust Services Criteria. Cryptographic controls reviewed in SOC 2 Type II audits.

label: GDPR
description: EU General Data Protection Regulation
compliance_notes: Art. 32 requires appropriate encryption. PQC becoming expected standard for long-lived personal data.

label: HITECH Act
description: Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health Act
compliance_notes: Extends HIPAA enforcement. Mandates breach notification and strong encryption for ePHI.

label: FDA 21 CFR Part 11
description: Electronic records and signatures in FDA-regulated industries
compliance_notes: Signature integrity requirements applicable to PQC migration for regulated medical software.

label: FedRAMP
description: Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program
compliance_notes: Cloud service authorization for U.S. federal agencies. Rev 5 expected to reference PQC.

label: DISA STIGs
description: Defense Information Systems Agency Security Technical Implementation Guides
compliance_notes: Mandatory hardening guides for U.S. DoD systems. Crypto requirements updated regularly.

label: NATO STANAG 4774
description: NATO confidentiality metadata labeling standard
compliance_notes: Coalition partner interoperability requirements. PQC transition affects classified data exchange.

label: ISO/SAE 21434
description: Road vehicle cybersecurity engineering standard
compliance_notes: Full vehicle lifecycle security including post-quantum readiness. Required for new type approvals.

label: UN ECE WP.29 R155/R156
description: UN regulations for vehicle cybersecurity and software updates
compliance_notes: Type approval requires cybersecurity management systems and secure OTA update processes.

label: NERC CIP
description: North American Electric Reliability Corporation Critical Infrastructure Protection
compliance_notes: Mandatory cybersecurity standards for bulk power systems. Crypto controls in CIP-005/007/011.

label: IEC 62443
description: Industrial cybersecurity standard for OT/ICS environments
compliance_notes: Defense-in-depth for industrial control systems. PQC relevant for long-lived OT deployments.

label: DO-326A / ED-202A
description: Airworthiness security process specification for aircraft systems
compliance_notes: Aviation cybersecurity certification basis. PQC critical given 30-40 year aircraft lifespans.

label: RTCA DO-355A
description: Information security guidance for continuing airworthiness
compliance_notes: Supplement to DO-326A for operational phase. Covers cryptographic controls in service.

label: FERPA
description: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act
compliance_notes: Student record confidentiality. Long retention periods imply HNDL exposure for sensitive records.

label: NIS2 Directive
description: EU network and information security directive for essential and important entities
compliance_notes: EU-wide cybersecurity baseline. Member states transposing into national law. PQC crypto risk management required.

label: COPPA
description: US Children's Online Privacy Protection Act
compliance_notes: Protects children under 13 online. PQC relevant for long-lived minor data and parental consent records.

label: TISAX
description: Trusted Information Security Assessment Exchange for automotive supply chain
compliance_notes: VDA-managed assessment for automotive suppliers. Covers information security including cryptographic controls.

label: MiCA
description: EU Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation
compliance_notes: EU regulation for crypto-asset service providers. Cryptographic custody and wallet security affected by PQC.

label: TSA Pipeline Security Directive
description: US TSA cybersecurity requirements for pipeline operators
compliance_notes: Mandatory cybersecurity measures for critical pipeline infrastructure. Covers encryption for SCADA/OT.

description: Securing web and API traffic with TLS

description: Encrypting stored data and files

description: Signing software and documents cryptographically

label: Key exchange / agreement
description: Establishing shared secret keys between parties

label: Authentication / identity
description: User and machine identity verification

label: Blockchain / cryptocurrency
description: Distributed ledger and digital asset cryptography

description: Encrypting and signing email communications

description: Encrypted network tunnels and site-to-site VPNs

label: IoT device communication
description: Cryptographic communication for connected devices

label: Database encryption
description: Encrypting database contents and backups

label: SIM/eSIM provisioning
description: Cryptographic provisioning of cellular subscriber identities

label: 5G network slicing security
description: PQC for network slice authentication and isolation in 5G

label: SS7/Diameter protocol security
description: Signaling protocol integrity for telecom core networks

label: SWIFT messaging integrity
description: Cryptographic signing and verification of SWIFT interbank messages

label: Trading system code signing
description: Digital signatures for high-frequency trading software

label: Card payment encryption
description: POS terminal and card-not-present transaction encryption

label: Medical device communication
description: Encrypted telemetry for connected medical devices

label: EHR/FHIR data exchange
description: Secure exchange of electronic health records via HL7/FHIR

label: V2X communication
description: Vehicle-to-everything communication security (DSRC/C-V2X)

label: OTA firmware updates
description: Signed over-the-air vehicle and device software updates

label: ECU secure boot
description: Root-of-trust for automotive electronic control units

label: SCADA/OT system security
description: Cryptographic controls for industrial control systems

label: Smart meter communication
description: Encrypted AMI/AMR infrastructure for utility metering

label: Avionics communication
description: Encrypted and authenticated flight-critical avionics comms

label: Satellite link encryption
description: Long-lived key protection for satellite command and telemetry

label: PKI / HSPD-12
description: Federal identity credentialing and PIV card cryptography

label: Classified data exchange
description: Cryptographic protection of classified communications

label: DNS/DNSSEC
description: DNS resolution integrity and DNSSEC zone signing

label: Timestamping services
description: Long-lived cryptographic timestamps for legal and financial evidence

label: Backup/archive encryption
description: Encryption of backup tapes and cloud archives and disaster recovery stores

label: API gateway / microservices
description: mTLS and JWT signing for service-to-service communication

label: Secure boot (non-automotive)
description: Root-of-trust and firmware verification for servers and devices

label: Less than 1 year
description: Short-lived sessions and temporary tokens

label: 1-5 years
description: Typical business records and customer data

label: 5-10 years
description: Financial records and audit trails

label: 10-25 years
description: Healthcare records, legal documents and PII

label: 25+ years
description: Regulatory archives and long-lived institutional records

label: Indefinite
description: Classified data, state secrets and cryptographic keys

label: 2 years (CDR / telecom)
description: Call detail records typical retention for mobile operators

label: 6 years (HIPAA minimum)
description: Minimum retention under HIPAA for protected health information

label: 7 years (financial records)
description: Standard regulatory records retention for financial institutions

label: 75+ years (government archival)
description: Long-lived government and national security archival records

label: Permanent (state secrets)
description: Records with no defined expiration date

description: Patient records, diagnoses, prescriptions, lab results

description: DNA sequencing, biobank records, longitudinal research

description: Scheduling, billing codes, facility operations

label: Customer financial records
description: Account balances, transactions, credit scores, PII

label: Trading algorithms / proprietary models
description: HFT strategies, risk models, pricing engines

label: Transaction logs
description: Audit trails, reconciliation records, batch processing data

description: National security data, intelligence products

label: Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI)
description: Export-controlled data, law enforcement sensitive

label: Internal government data (FOUO)
description: Pre-decisional documents, internal correspondence

label: Network topology / configurations
description: Core network architecture, routing tables, SS7 configs

description: Subscriber communications metadata, location data

label: Subscriber metadata
description: Account info, service plans, billing data

label: Cryptographic keys / secrets
description: Private keys, API secrets, HSM contents

label: Source code / intellectual property
description: Proprietary algorithms, trade secrets

label: User analytics / telemetry
description: Usage patterns, A/B test data, anonymized metrics

label: SCADA/OT operational data
description: Industrial control commands, safety system configs

label: Grid topology / infrastructure maps
description: Distribution network, substation configurations

label: Meter readings / consumption data
description: AMI data, billing usage, demand forecasts

label: Autonomous driving algorithms
description: ML models, sensor fusion logic, safety-critical code

description: Vehicle-to-infrastructure messages, location data

label: Vehicle telemetry
description: Engine diagnostics, performance metrics, OBD data

label: Flight control software / avionics
description: Safety-critical algorithms, weapons systems

label: Passenger manifests / crew PII
description: Travel records, passport data, security clearances

label: Maintenance logs
description: Service records, parts inventory, compliance documentation

label: Payment card data (PCI scope)
description: Card numbers, CVVs, transaction auth data

label: Customer purchase history / PII
description: Order history, addresses, preferences

label: Product catalog
description: Public listings, pricing, inventory counts

label: Student records (FERPA)
description: Grades, disciplinary records, financial aid

label: Research data / IP
description: Unpublished research, grant proposals, patent-pending work

description: Public curriculum, class listings, academic calendar
